meanings.definition: A track or set of tracks for trams or streetcars.
meanings.sent1: The tramway was lined with shiny rails for the streetcar to travel on.
meanings.sent2: The city invested in a new tramway to improve public transportation.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the tramway rails were a fun balance beam.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a busy tramway, with thoughts racing in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The tramway hummed with the sound of the approaching streetcar.

meanings.definition: A system of trams or streetcars.
meanings.sent1: The old town had a reliable tramway connecting all neighborhoods.
meanings.sent2: People relied on the tramway system to commute to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The tramway operators organized a fun race using the streetcars.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a well-functioning tramway, smoothly connecting them.
meanings.sent5: The tramway network expanded to reach more areas of the city.
